title: Education Center
desc: An intuitive online learning platform concept designed for mobile-first experiences.
Features smooth onboarding, accessible course navigation, and user progress tracking.
Crafted with engaging visuals and a structured layout for better learning flow.

title: Instagram for Vision Pro
desc: Futuristic UI concept for Instagram tailored for Apple Vision Pro.
Explores spatial interaction design with immersive post viewing and 3D interface layering.
Focuses on gesture control and floating UI components for next-gen UX.

title: Travel Guy
desc: Landing page design for a vibrant and modern travel company.
Highlights featured destinations with vivid visuals and user-focused sections.
Crafted for desktop and mobile views using a grid-based layout and clean typography.

title: Glass Morphism Icons
desc: A stylish set of UI icons designed with glassmorphism aesthetics.
Ideal for futuristic interfaces and dashboards with translucent effects.
Designed for consistency, scalability, and clean integration into mobile/web UIs.
